companyDetails: Dgency is a high-impact Digital Marketing Agency in Bangladesh. At Dgency, we implement strategic marketing solutions that deliver more customers, grow revenue, and future-proof your business.
jobDetails: Job Description: As a Wordpress Developer with our team, you will be responsible for executing best-in-class new website builds as well as feature and template updates to existing websites across a portfolio of client websites. Working with our team of designers and overseen by a project manager, we are looking for someone with strong expertise in WordPress theme development using modern standards for HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, native JS (ES6), latest Bootstrap libraries, and is familiar with Gutenberg, ACF Pro, Gravity Forms, Composer, NodeJS, and Git (for collaborative development). The ideal candidate should be capable of implementing pixel-perfect responsive web builds based on provided designs.
responsibilities: Responsibilities: Develop and implement highly optimized and customizable WordPress sites, themes, plugins, custom post types, page templates, widgets, content blocks, etc. based on developer-ready Figma / Adobe XD files.Write clean, valid code using modern standards and libraries (HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, native JS-ES6).Leverage the latest Elementor / Gutenberg editor capabilities to create scalable Wordpress editing experiences.Perform tasks related to WordPress environment installations, base configurations, and upgrades.Integrating with third-party RESTful APIs and microservices.Perform reliable troubleshooting, Q/A and testing for one's own work, including implementing backwards compatibility testing for older browsers as needed. Deliver bug-free, lightning-fast, flexible builds with punctuality and precision.Communicate with project managers regularly through project checkpoint meetings, code reviews, and project management tools.
qualification: Qualifications:M.Sc/ B.Sc in Computer Science and Engineering3 years of experience in digital agency/software making company    Write clean, valid code using modern standards and libraries (HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, native JS-ES6)Create Unit and Integration tests to ensure the quality of codeWrite code that is cross-platform and cross-device compatibleSolving problems both in Micro (debugging code) and Macro (architect new features) levelsExcellent analytical and critical thinking skills.Ability to work under pressureCommunicate with project managers regularly through project checkpoint meetings, code reviews, and project management tools

companyDetails: The fastest growing Cloud Based Marketplace Company, Field Nation is looking for a 'Software Engineer' for its development team. As we are rising day by day, our needs are evolving and to keep pace with the evolution we need experts like you to contribute, learn and grow with us. As a Software Engineer you will be contributing to the integral development of the team with a high level of professionalism and accountability. This position will also offer the chance to work in a fast-paced, hyper growth environment where innovative ideas are encouraged and collaboration is a must. This position is located in Uttara, Dhaka.
jobDetails: Expert on PHP, OOP, MVC, MySQL and JavaScript.Knowledgeable in OOP JS, node.js and express.js.Knowledgeable in CSS3, Bootstrap Grid System, HTML5.Experience with ES6 and react.js. Open to learning new technologies.Strong written and verbal communication skills in English Relational database performance optimizations Experience with REST APIs.Familiarity with the Git version control system. Familiarity with the Git version control system.
responsibilities: Competitive salary based on experience and qualification. Gratuity benefit Medical Insurance Career Development Budget Sound work-life balance - Regular working hours: 8 hours/day, 5 days a week. Friendly work environment. Flexible leave/vacation policy. A great learning opportunity. The opportunity to work with cross-cultural teams with the US.
qualification: Bachelor or Master level degree in Computer Science or Engineering from a reputed University or equivalent practical experience. At least 2 years of experience in full-stack software development.

companyDetails: R&G Communication  Khilkhet Thana, Dhaka, Bangladesh Hybrid
jobDetails: Must have mentality to work for long term with ownership. Should not like to say it's not possible without try. Should not be leave the job before complete any project. Must have develop project with object-oriented programming, data structure, and algorithm. Design database and optimize queries for better performance. Develop Back-end, Front-end & Full-stack programing and logic in PHP (Laravel). You will be responsible to develop/upgrading web-based projects as a team member or individual.
responsibilities: Front-end: HTML, CSS, jQuery, Ajax, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, , React.js/Vue Js & Angular JS & etc. Back-end: Object Oriented Programing, PHP (Laravel), MySQL, PostgreSQL, NoSQL & etc. Must have at least 1 years' experience in web development. Should have previous 1 real time complete project. Able to Trouble-shoot basic computer related problem. Skills Required: Bootstrap, jQuery, MySQL, NoSql, PHP (Laravel), PostgreSQL, Python (Django), React.js, Vue Js, Tailwind CSS
qualification: At least 1 year The applicants should have experience in Object Oriented programing, PHP (Laravel) reshers are also encouraged to apply

companyDetails: IT Managed Services, Software Development, IT Training, Software Consulting, IT Staffing, Digital Marketing, Azure, AWS , Splunk , Service-now, Salesforce, Mulesoft, React Native, and React Js
jobDetails: Must work in US time zone 8Am MST to 5 PM MST. Salary Paid Yearly 3,60,000 BDT Must have a Valid Passport Have experience at least 3 years' experience with following technologies. AWS, Python, Django, Kubernetes, Containers, Docker, Ubuntu, serverless API management Monitoring tools like Dynatrace, New Relic, Splunk and MySQL
responsibilities: Deployment coordination for SaaS Infrastructure on Private and Public Clouds. Deployment of Infrastructure from VMware, Microsoft, ProxMox, Ceph, Linux KVM, Docker, and Citrix. Deployment and Management of DevOps infrastructure including Django, Angular, React, Redis, Celery, Elasticsearch, and PostgreSQL Servers. DevOps environment optimization. Monitoring of Network, Application, and Cloud environments.
qualification: 2 years of experience with VMware, Citrix, Linux KVM, or Azure infrastructure. 1 Year of Linux Server Administration. Having a worked in a highly motivated, fast-paced, critical support role. Excellent decision making and critical-thinking skills. An ability to work in a fast-paced and quickly changing environment.
